100585.「じつは 黒怨王の封印が 予想以上に早く\n 破られようと しているみたいなの…:
It seems that the Hell King's seal is about to
be broken sooner than expected... and that's
why the grudge is increasing in number.

100586.「まぁ……ともかく。この勢いだと 黒怨王が\n 完全復活し 世界が 怨霊におおわ:
Well... anyway. At this rate, it's only a matter of time before the Hell King returns and the world is covered in grudges. So before
that happens...

100587.「あなたには 黒怨王を倒すのに 必要な\n 踊り子の 奥義を習得してほしいの。\:
I need you to master the secrets of the dancer
necessary to defeat the Hell King. You'll do
it, won't you?

100588.「そうよね。私の合方だものね。\n 聞くまでも なかったわ……。:
Yes, of course. It's my combination. I didn't
need to ask...

100589.「じつは その奥義を 習得するには\n わたしたち 踊り子の 守護神……\n 踊:
To master the secrets of this art, we need the
amulet of the God of Dance... the guardian
deity of dancers.

100590.「あなたには それを手に入れてほしいの。\n これから その方法を 説明するから:
I want you to have it. Explanation of how to
do that is coming up, so please listen
carefully.

100591.「まずは ウェナ諸島 ジュレー島上層にいる\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>:
First, defeat <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> Fluff Puffs in Upper Jule
Island in the Wena Islands.

100592.「ただし 普通に 倒すだけじゃダメよ。\n 敵に おどりスキルの ふういんのダン:
However, it is not enough to just defeat them. You must perform the Dance of Sealing on the enemy, and defeat them while the effect is
still active.

100593.「<%nEV_QUE_T_NUM0>匹 倒し終えた時 古き伝説のしぐさ……\n:
When you have defeated <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> of them, you'll learn a legendary gesture, a special dance to call upon the God of Dance, a gesture from an
ancient legend.

100594.「その踊りを ウェナ諸島 ラーディス王島の\n 北部に点在する ９つの小舞台……:
If that dance is performed on one of the nine small stages that dot the northern part of King Ladis Island in the Wena Islands... the
one farthest from wisdom... ...

100595.「伝承の間への道が 開かれるわ。\n そこで 踊り神さまが あなたの実力を\n:
It will lead you to the Hall of Lore. There,
the God of Dance will recognize your abilities
and grant you an amulet.

100596.「踊り神さまは 荒神さまの 異名を持つほど\n 強く 激しいお方……。認めてもら:
The God of Dance is so strong and fierce that
he's known as Powerful Deity. It's hard to get
recognition... but I'm sure you'll be fine.

100597.「それじゃ……がんばってね。\n 私も あなたに負けないよう 修行してくるわ。\:
Well then...good luck. I'm going to go train
so that I don't lose to you. The day of the
battle is near!

100598.「ありがとう。だけど あなた……\n 他の仕事が つまってるみたいよ。\n さす:
Thank you. But you... seem to be stuck with
other work. That's my partner. You're very
popular.

100599.「でも……本当にもう 時間がないの。\n だから 早く終わらせて\n また 戻っ:
But...I really don't have much time left. So
please hurry up and come back.

100600.「もう！ 今さら 怖気づくなんて。\n それでも あなた 私の合方なの？:
Already! I can't believe you're scared of me
after all this time. Are you still my partner?

100601.「まあ いずれにせよ そんな調子じゃ\n 修行をこなすのは 無理そうね。\n 気:
Well, in any case, it looks like you won't be able to complete your training at this rate. You'd better get yourself together and come
back.

100603.「ようこそ 踊り子チャン。おっと……\n これじゃあ お顔が 見えないわネ。: Welcome, Dancer. Oops...I can't see your face.

100604.「なるほどネ。ウフフッ……ラブリィ<heart>\n ただ いたずらに 腰をクネ:
I see. I see...Lovely...unlike the recent
bunch of cowards who are just wiggling their
hips for no reason at all!

100605.「でも！ 荒神の異名をもつ このワタシ……\n 踊り神ボニータの ラブリィな荒ぶ:
But! I, Dance God Bonita, also known as
Powerful Deity, am so lovingly rough. How can
you not be bowled over by this?

100606.「ラッララーラ ラッラーララー！\n ラッラーラーラ ラッラーララー！:
Rallallah, Rallallah, Rallallah! Rallallah,
Rallallah, Rallallah!

100607.「ピーヒャラピーヒャラ……！\n ズコズコドンドン……！:
Pee-hoo, pee-hoo, pee-hoo...! Thump, thump,
thump, thump...!

100610.「この勢いに 飲まれないなんてネ……。\n ウフフッ……ラブリィ<heart>\:
I can't believe I haven't been swept up in
this momentum...Lovely<heart> You are quite a rough
one, aren't you?

100611.「いいワ。全力で 荒ぶってあげル。\n そして 荒ぶり比べで 私に勝ったなラ……:
That's okay. I'll give it my all. And if you beat me in the contest of roughness, I will recognize you as the one who has passed down
the secrets of the art!

100613.「あららラ？ こりもせずに\n 舞い戻ってくるとは お馬鹿さんネ。\n でも……:
Oh, la? You're a fool to come back here
without doing anything. But...tee-hee...lovely
<heart>.

100614.「あきらめの悪い子は 嫌いじゃないノ。\n 何度だって 荒ぶり殺しにしてあげるワ:
I don't hate a girl who gives up. I'm gonna
beat you to death over and over again. Come
on! Come on!

100616.「あっふ～ん……。この私が\n ここまで コテンパンに\n 荒ぶり負け するなん:
I can't believe I've been beaten to a pulp so
severely...

100617.「でもね。ウフフッ……ラブリィ<heart>\n 負けちゃうの……じつは 三度目:
But. Tee-hee...lovely<heart> This is the third
time I've lost. Struck out! I'm not quite
there yet either.

100618.「それにしても あなたの 荒ぶりレベルは\n 以前の ふたりと比べても なかなか:
But your level of roughness is still quite impressive compared to the two of us before. Don't forget. That roughness is the essence of
dancing.

100619.「踊り子の 魂と肉体の荒ぶりは\n ラブリィなエナジィを 生み出すわ。\n 生者:
The dancer's soul and the wildness of her body
produce Lovely Energies. Energies that inspire
the living and purify the grudge.

100620.「そのエナジィで みんなのテンションを\n アゲアゲに しちゃうのが\n ワタシ:
The energy of the Deity Dance is what makes
everyone's spirits soar.

100621.「さあ……約束どおり アナタを\n その継承者として 認めてあげるワ。\n あれ:
Now... as promised, I'm going to recognize you
as its heir. I have to give it to you.

100622.「ガサゴソ……ガサゴソ……っト。\n あら？ どこの羽根に 仕舞ったかしラ。\n:
Rustle...rustle...rustle.... Oh? Where did you
put them in the feathers?
Rustle...rustle...rustle...rustle...

100623.「あ……あン！ こんなところニ。\n よかっタ よかっタ。あったわヨ。\n ハイ:
Ah... ah! This is the place. That's good.
That's good. There it is. Hey! Here, take
this.

100624.荒神の護符（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me 60>: You received the Deity's Amulet (Key Item)!<me 60>

100625.「あとは 合方となる踊り子に\n 継承の儀を 執りおこなってもらえバ……\n 奥:
Then, the dancer who will be your partner will
perform the inheritance ceremony and you will
be able to learn the secrets of the art.

100626.「奥義を 必要としているということは\n 黒怨王の復活は 近いのネ……。\n 幸:
If he needs the secrets, Hell King's
resurrection is imminent and I wish him the
best of luck.

100628.「おかえりなさい <pc>。\n どうやら 踊り神さまに 認められることが\n:
Welcome back <pc>. Looks like you've
earned the approval of the God of Dance...
that's what I'm talking about!

100630.「護符は 持っているだけじゃ 意味がないわよ。\n 私が そのチカラを解放してあ:
It's not enough just to have the amulet. I can
unlock its power. So give it to me quickly.

100632.「それじゃあ さっそくだけど……\n 継承の儀式を 始めるわよ。:
Well, then, let's get started right away...
with the rite of succession.

100633.「荒ぶる神のチカラを 秘めたる護符よ……。\n 継承を認められし者 <pc>に\:
O amulet that holds the power of the raging god, bestow upon the one who has been granted the inheritance the profound
secrets of the dancer....

100635.「……よし。継承成功ね。\n その荒神の舞が 放つエネルギー……\n それこそが:
...Good. The succession succeeded. The energy
released by that Deity Dance... is the key to
defeating the Hell King.

100636.「でも…… 残念ながら それだけでは\n ヤツを 完全に浄化することはできない。:
But... unfortunately, that's not enough to
completely cleanse him. There's only one way
to do that...

100637.「荒神の舞を ふたり同時に舞うことで\n そのチカラを増幅させる 究極の対の舞…:
We have no choice but to... complete the
ultimate pair of Deity Dances that amplify the
Deity Dance's power by doing both at once.

100638.「私と かつての合方でさえ 荒神連舞を\n 完全に 極めることはできなかった……:
Even I and my former partner could not fully
master the Deity Dance...

100639.「けれど あなたなら 荒神連舞のチカラに\n 耐えられるはず！ 今度こそ 究極の:
But I know you can withstand the power of the
Deity Dance! I'm sure this time you'll be able
to perform the ultimate pair of dances!

100640.「私はね…… <pc>。\n 除霊踊りを舞うのは\n 私たちで 終わりにしたいと:
I am... <pc>. I'd like to finish
dancing the expulsion dance with us.

100641.「私の一族は 代々 黒怨王との戦いに\n 身を投じ 戦いの中に散っていったわ……:
For generations, my family has thrown ourselves into the battle against the Hell King, and we have been scattered amongst the
fray... it was our family's mission, our destiny.

100642.「でもね……やっぱり 仲間たちと\n 楽しく踊ったり 舞台に立ったり……。\n:
But...I still enjoy dancing and performing
with my friends... I was happiest during those
times.

100643.「ご先祖様が聞いたら 怒るだろうけど……。\n 今は そういう踊り子が 増えてい:
My ancestors would be angry if they heard
this... I am very happy that there are more
and more dancers like that now. So...

100644.「世界中の 踊り子たちの幸せのためにも\n 黒怨王は倒され 除霊踊りは 古い伝説:
For the happiness of all the dancers in the
world, the Hell King must be defeated and the
Exorcism Dance forgotten as a legend...

100645.「それじゃ あなたと共に 荒神の舞を\n 舞える日を 楽しみにしているわ。\n:
Well then, I look forward to the day when I
can perform the Deity Dance with you. Let's do
our best for each other.

100646.「……と思ったけど これは どういうこと？\n すでに 奥義に目覚めているじゃな:
...I was wondering, what does this mean? You've already awakened to the secrets of the art. How did you do it without the help of a
talisman?

100647.「まさか 荒神さまとの戦いの中で\n 自然に目覚めた……とでもいうの？\n さす:
Don't tell me... you were awakened by nature
during the battle with the Powerful Deity?
That's my partner. I don't know your depths.

100648.「それほどの 実力の持ち主に\n 喜んでもらえるかは わからないけれど……\n:
I don't know if I can please someone of that
caliber, but...this is a celebration of the
Powerful Deity's recognition.

100649.「さて あなたが習得した奥義…… \n 荒神の舞が放つ エネルギー。\n それこ:
Now, the secret that you have mastered... the
energy that Deity Dance releases. That is the
key to defeating the Hell King.

118066.「やつらに とりつかれる人も 増える一方……。\n 私も 仕事を減らして 除霊に:
More and more people are being possessed by
him... I've cut back on my exorcism work but
I'll be back to living on bread crumbs.

118067.「言ってなかったけど……今までに\n 踊り神さまから 認めてもらえたのは\n 私:
I never told you this, but... until now, only
two people, myself and my former partner, have
been recognized by the God of Dance.

118068.「ふふっ……やっぱり 私の目に狂いは\n なかったようね。それじゃあ\n 手に入:
Well... it seems I was right after all. Now
then, please hand over the charm you received.
